attributes.title: Server-side experimentation, with Tom van den Berg & Ruben de Boer (Online Dialogue)
attributes.summary:
Learn what makes server-side testing different from client-side testing, if can you use both simultaneously and what the common mistakes are you need to avoid.

Podcast Partners: Convert.com, OnlineDialogue.com, Sitespect.com, Contentsquare.com and OnlineInfluence.com
attributes.description:
Partners:
  • Convert: convert.com/features
  • Online Dialogue: onlinedialogue.nl
  • SiteSpect: sitespect.com
  • Contentsquare: contentsquare.com
  • Online Invloed: onlineinvloed.nl
 Guest 1: Tom van den Berg URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/tom-van-den-berg | Guest 2: Ruben de Boer URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/ruben-de-boer
